definition: close friend/pal/(social networking website) friend/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: Families and communities share the happiness of gathering together for iftar and prayers.
sentences.chinese: 亲朋好友欢聚一堂，共享斋月晚餐并共同祈祷。

sentences.english: I was on the good friends with people.
sentences.chinese: 我就在好友上随便加了好多人。
瑞姆于是就将调查员加为了好友。

sentences.english: As they work to stop the plague from spreading, Tarrou and Dr. Rieux become good friends.
sentences.chinese: 塔鲁和李欧医生也在合力阻止瘟疫扩散中结为好友。

sentences.english: At the buddy club, older students talk to new students about school life.
sentences.chinese: 在好友俱乐部里，大一点的学生向新生介绍校园生活。

sentences.english: A long conversation with a friend.
sentences.chinese: 和好友的一次促膝长谈。

sentences.english: In Houllier, Wenger is also competing against an old ally today.
sentences.chinese: 对霍利尔来说，温格也是他多年的同胞好友兼对手。

sentences.english: A Christmas greeting to cheer you,my goodfriend.
sentences.chinese: 献上令你开心的圣诞祝福，我的好友。

sentences.english: His two closest nude-curious friends are female, after all.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他的两个亲近的好奇裸体好友却都是女性。

sentences.english: Now you can join in on the fun episodically.
sentences.chinese: 这游戏当然要和好友一起玩才有趣。

sentences.english: No Road is too long with good company.
sentences.chinese: 有好友一路相伴，长途也不显遥远。

sentences.english: Lucky generous, carry convenience is tasted the friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 吉祥大方，携带方便是馈赠亲朋好友之佳品。

sentences.english: The Vedels were Laura's parents and Edouard's close friends.
sentences.chinese: 维德尔夫妇是劳拉的父母，也是爱德华的好友。

sentences.english: Select all accounts that buddies should be auto-added to.
sentences.chinese: 选择要将好友自动添加到哪些账户。

sentences.english: Save money on trips by staying with friends or relatives.
sentences.chinese: 出差时住在亲朋好友家可以节省费用。

sentences.english: A rag doll, a best friend, the voice of Mary Costa.
sentences.chinese: 一个玩具娃娃，一位好友，玛丽可思塔的声音。

definition: old friend/sb who passed the county level imperial exam (in Ming dynasty)
good friend/(slang) a visit from Aunt Flo (menstrual period)
(dialect) close childhood friend whom one grew up with/a couple who grew up as childhood friends
to get to know each other/acquaintance
